$$ å¹¶å‡è®¾ä¸€ä¸ªå˜åˆ†æ¨¡å‹ $\lambda = \log(\alpha)$ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸” $$ \lambda\sim\mathcal{N}(\lambda\mid\mu,\sigma) $$ ç„¶å $$ \å¼€å§‹{å¯¹é½} f(y,\lambda) &= \prod_{i = 1}^n \left[\frac{1^{e^{\lambda}}}{\Gamma(e^{\lambda})}y_i^ {e^{\lambda} - 1}e^{-be^{\lambda}}\right]\times \frac{b^a}{\Gamma(a)}e^{\lambda a}e^{ -be^{\lambda}}\\ &= \frac{1}{\Gamma^n(e^{\lambda})}\left(\prod_{i = 1}^n y_i\right)^{e^{\lambda} - 1}e ^{-\sum_{i = 1}^n y_i}\frac{b^a}{\Gamma(a)}e^{a\lambda}e^{-be^{\lambda}}\\ \log f(y,\lambda) &= -n\log\Gamma(e^{\lambda}) - (e^{\lambda} - 1)\sum_{i = 1}^n\log(y_i ) - \sum_{i = 1}^n y_i + a\log(b) - \log\Gamma(a) + a\lambda - be^{\lambda}\\ &= -n\log\Gamma(e^{\lambda}) - \left(\sum_{i = 1}^n\log(y_i)\right)(e^{\lambda} - 1) + \ sum_{i = 1}^n y_i + a\log(b) - \log\Gamma(a) + a\lambda - be^{\lambda}; \ç»“æŸ{å¯¹é½} $$ æˆ–è€…æ›´å‡†ç¡®åœ°è¯´ï¼Œ $\lambda = \mu + \sigma\varepsilon$ ä¸º $\varepsilon\sim\mathcal{N }(0.1)$ æ‰€ä»¥ $$ \alpha = \exp(\mu + \sigma\varepsilon)ã€‚ $$ æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œè¦è§£é™¤ç»‘å®š $\sigma$ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è¯´ $\tau = \log\sigma$ >ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œ $$ \alpha = \exp(\mu + e^\tau\varepsilon)ã€‚ $$ ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å‰©ä¸‹äº† $$ \å¼€å§‹{å¯¹é½} \log f(y,\valuepsilon\mid\mu,\tau) &= -n\log\Gamma(e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\valuepsilon}) - \left(\sum_{i = 1}^n\log(y_i) + b\right)(e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon} - 1) + \sum_{i = 1}^n y_i + a\log( b) - \log\Gamma(a) + a(\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon) - be^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon}\\ &\propto -n\log\Gamma(e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon}) - \left(\sum_{i = 1}^n\log(y_i) + b\right) ; (e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon} - 1) + a(\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon) - be^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon } \\ \ç»“æŸ{å¯¹é½} $$ ç›¸å¯¹äº $\mu, \tau$ å¯¼å‡ºè¯¥æ•°é‡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ‰ï¼š $$ \å¼€å§‹{å¯¹é½} \frac{\partial \log f}{\partial \mu} &= -ne^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon}\Psi(\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon) - \left(\sum_{i = 1}^n\log y_i\right)e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon} + a - be^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon }\\ \frac{\partial \log f}{\partial \tau} &= -n\varepsilon e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon} \Psi(\mu + e^{\tau}\ varepsilon) - \varepsilon\left(\sum_{i = 1}^n\log y_i\right)e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\varepsilon} + ae^{\tau}\varepsilon - b\ ; å˜ç‘æ™®è¥¿éš† e^{\mu + e^{\tau}\å˜ç‘æ™®è¥¿éš†} \ç»“æŸ{å¯¹é½} $$ ç°åœ¨ï¼Œå®Œæˆæ‰€æœ‰è¿™äº›åï¼Œæˆ‘æƒ³çŸ¥é“å¦‚ä½•å¤„ç† $q$ã€‚ä»é‡æ–°å‚æ•°åŒ–æŠ€å·§æ¥çœ‹ï¼Œ $q_{\varepsilon}$ æ˜¯æ ‡å‡†æ­£æ€ï¼Œå¯¹å—ï¼Ÿ $\frac{\partial q}{\partial\mu} = 0$ ç­‰ç­‰ï¼Ÿ
